data.name: WWE 2K25 MyFACTION Diamond Pack
data.detailed_description:
Step into MyFACTION with main-event energy. The Diamond Pack is your chance to bring proven power and fresh intensity to your faction with Superstars, Evolution cards, and packs straight from some of the best series in WWE 2K25.

The MyFACTION Diamond Pack includes:

  • 15,000 VC

  • Karrion Kross Diamond Evolution Card

  • Jade Cargill Diamond Evolution Card

  • Sol Ruca Live Event Requirement Card (August)

  • Je'Von Evans Live Event Requirement Card (September)

  • 2x Basic Money in the Bank Packs

  • 1x Basic Bloodline Series Pack

  • 1x Basic Legends Series 2 Pack

  • 1x Basic Punches & Promos Pack

  • 1x Basic Sinister Series 1 Pack

  • 1x Deluxe Demastered Series Pack

  • 1x Deluxe Legends Series 1 Pack

  • 1x Deluxe Fierce Series 1 Pack

  • 1x Deluxe Ascent Series Pack

  • 1x Deluxe Electric Series 1 Pack

  • 1x Deluxe Tempest Pack

*Online play including MyFACTION and MyGM requires an Internet connection and 2K Account. Console online play requires a separate paid subscription. Terms apply.
